It is characterized by its bell-shaped, often yellow or greenish-yellow flowers that bloom in late summer. It has narrow, lance-shaped leaves and produces small, capsule-like fruits containing seeds. Due to its specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and somewhat elusive species in the wild.
